TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed ExporterEventKind extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the callbacks that the type library exporter makes when exporting a type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The type library exporter passes the values of this enumeration to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink.ReportEvent%2A> method of an object which implements the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink> interface. The value passed identifies the specific kind of event being reported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExporterEventKind ERROR_REFTOINVALIDASSEMBLY = int32(2)

Docs.summary: This value is not supported in this version of the .NET Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExporterEventKind NOTIF_CONVERTWARNING = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the event is invoked when a warning occurs during conversion.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExporterEventKind NOTIF_TYPECONVERTED = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the event is invoked when a type has been exported.
